pages.title: Void Gateway
pages.text: Void Gateway is the portal block that takes you to the Void, in order to use it, right click on the block

pages.title: Corruption Gateway
pages.text: Corruption Gateway is the portal block that takes you to the Corruption, in order to use it, right click on the block, unlike the Void Gateway, this block can be mined with at least a Diamond Pickaxe

pages.title: Funghonite Ore
pages.text: Funghonite can be found in the Mushroom Fields, and can be only mined with Meteorite pickaxe, once mined it drops Hard Fungus

pages.title: Endrium
pages.text: Endrium can be found in the End, and can be only mined with Hellstone pickaxe, once mined it drops Endrium Gem

pages.title: Corrupt Ore
pages.text: Corrupt Ores are found all over the Corruption, and can be mined only with Void Pickaxe, once mined it drops Corrupt Piece
